name: MangoDesk
long_description:
Weâ€™re an end-to-end AI platform to source, screen, and manage domain experts to evaluate and improve AI models with high-quality data. 

AGI requires expert-created data and evals across domains, quickly and at volumes. Finding the right experts and creating this data reliably is a complex operational challenge. We solve this end-to-end. Our customers are foundation model labs and application layer AI companies. 

Ankith was previously an engineer at Scale AI where he built the infrastructure for expert sourcing/screening and Gen AI data labeling operations, and Ananth previously founded a software firm with seven-figure revenue and Fortune 500 customers.
one_liner: We improve AI models by sourcing domain experts for data and evals.
